instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-01521: What is 820-01521? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMC_LID_LEFT: What is SMC_LID_LEFT? SMC_LID_LEFT is a signal that tells the system if the lid is closed from the left LID sensor. If it is low, the system thinks the lid is closed â€“ if it is 3.3v, the system thinks the machine is open. SMC_LID_LEFT needs to be high for the machine to stay awake and have a backlight. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> image crackle on external
threads.message:
Good afternoon, this Mac suffered oxidation in region 7655, 8FHXTW and conector FPC LCD, where components were missing, I performed the replacement, in tests the Mac takes a while to present image, and after a while the image is distorted, cracked.

PPBUS 12.65V

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> image crackle on external
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> image crackle on external
threads.message:
Do you mean corrosion around <TRANSISTOR>Q7065</TRANSISTOR>?
Does it charge and works with battery alone?

Internal LCD image is good, only has external video problems?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> image crackle on external
threads.message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 73526, member: 682"]
Do you mean corrosion around <TRANSISTOR>Q7065</TRANSISTOR>?
[/QUOTE]
yes.

It turns on only when the battery is connected.

The display does not show an image, as it has been shorted on the LCD connector, <SIGNAL>PDM_DMIC_DATA0_ISOL</SIGNAL>, <SIGNAL>PDM_DMIC_CLK0</SIGNAL> and <SIGNAL>SMC_LID_LEFT</SIGNAL>.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01521</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> image crackle on external
threads.message:
Pretty hopeless project.
Damaged LCD connector by liquid is almost sure bad CPU.
iGPU eDP outputs directly connected to J8500.
